hackathon-description-text: Come spend the night building and learning with us!  DevFest, Columbia's annual week-long festival of learning and hacking, ends with a hackathon, where you get the chance to apply what you've learned and create something awesome.

hackathon-judges.judge-role: Co-founder and Executive Director at Enza Academy
Emerging Technologies Coordinator in Columbia University Libraries’ Digital Scholarship division

hackathon-rules:
Check out our Code of Conduct 
.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Bose SoundLink Speakers for each member of the winning team.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of Digital Ocean products

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: A Chromecast and Google Home Mini to each member of the winning team for the best use of Google Cloud Platform.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best use of Google Cloud API

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Amazon Echos to the top 3 contributors.
Arduino Unos for every member of the winning team.
Orange Pi Zeros for every member of the winning team.
Pizza party for you and your friends!
BB-8 robot for each team member.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Best Use of Data for Social Impact

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Trip to the Google NYC office and lunch with some engineers.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Runner Up for Google Cloud API

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this a new idea? Has it been done before?
How useful is this idea? Can we see it being used in real life?
